lines.text: [Nick has just eaten an unborn chick directly from the egg to improve relations with the tribe]
So you guys eat this all the time or is just for... uhm... ceremonies?
Are you kidding? We don't eat that shit!

[after he shoots a wounded mercenary]
Bullets are cheap and the medics are late.

[to Keefer]
Welcome to Hell.
[repeated line]
Sweden, like me.
This time you'll be working in a beautiful, warm and very tropical paradise!
I hate the heat.
Will it help if we say who recommended you?
I know who recommended me.
Why didn't you recommend Keefer?
Keefer... This op, for what I'm told, isn't just slash and burn. This one calls for the touch of the poet.
What colour?
[Nick stares at him]
What colour is the people you want me to shoot at, man?
Lighter than you but darker than me.

[to one of his employees]
Relax, I'm not gonna kill you... yet!

[sitting in front of the gorilla's cage at the zoo]
I know they're doomed. You can see it in the eyes. Ten, twenty years they'll be extinct.
I was surprised to hear you were still breathing yourself.
The world is dying, Nick. It needs a witness.

[after knocking his adversary down]
Hey, if you wanna bet your last dime - it might as well be on yourself, right?
[his opponent gets up and knocks him out]
So, what is your story, bitch? Mmmh?
I'm stuck in an island run by assholes. What's yours?
Look, I can help you guys out *and* I can take orders.
I'll take a beaver sandwich.
You want some company tonight, boss? Loki! Can be pretty lonely in the jungle.
No, I don't need any company.

[whispering]
Shit, I'll take her Nick!
[Nick stares badly at him]
Alright, I want you to take me on a guided tour of the shitpile.
Sure thing, boss!
Keep your eyes open back here.

[mimicking Po]
Sure thing, boss!

[Jamaal's been hit by a child with a blowgun]
First blood!
C'mon, how do you defend yourselves?
What to defend? A couple of trees, lot of rock, bird shit on everything.
My mother want to know if you fall from the sky with jellyfish, but I tell her you wash upon sand like garbage.
Thank you.
You're a pain in the ass, you know that?
My... my father say same thing.
You want me to kill for bird shit?
Why not? You've done that for less!
Allright. As of now, I take control of this island. Anyone fucks with it, fucks with me!

[to Nick]
One can be a mercenary and still a gentleman.
Found the jade, didn't you?
There's no jade. It's bird shit.
Bird shit? Oh boy... what do you think I am, an idiot?
Where's everybody?
They're with the dead.
The spirit has been gone a long time, but will run back to us. We will fight.
Like the Old People?
Old People story is bullshit. We are the Old People.
A man has to have something to honor, Nick, and all I've got left is my word. I gave my word.

[smiling, after one of Merrick's men blows up a mine]
She moved the fucking mines!

[ironically]
Got a real crackerjack team Colonel, uh?

[to Colonel Merrick]
Tomorrow I'll give you bodies.

[to a mercenary who tried to shoot him in the back but got burned by the backfire of the bazooka]
Don't sneak up on people.
Where you'll go?
Home.
Where's that?
Don't ask.
[last lines]
We have a legend. It tells of a man who comes far from the oceans and save us from great danger.
Really?
No. But I'm working on it.
This is not the ordinary I hit you, you hit me, I hit you, you hit me. No, no, no, no. This is I hit you, I hit you, I fucking hit you!
[to his soldiers]
Every time he touches me, kill one of his men.
Keefer?
Yeah, the three of us back together again. Better to keep an army intact than to destroy it. So on, son. I envy you. You're gonna die for something you believe in.

[burning the flag of truce]
I'll see you in hell, Nicky Gunar!
Grace's on the mission.
[to his men]
Her cut comes out your pay.
Kind remind you of Angola, doesn't it Nicky? Mmmh? All that burning flesh? God, I was afraid I would never breathe this smell again, Nicky!
Are you from around here?
Born this bar, room down the hall.
Do you ever wish it was like it used to be, before we came?

[gestures to bed impatiently]
You wanna fuck, twenty dollar! You wanna make friend, cost more!
No shit.

[He hits Keefer in the head with an ancient tribal axe; the axe shatters]
Fuck.
